channel.title: Node.js on Simon Gilbert Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Node.js on Simon Gilbert Blog

item.title: Creating and Deploying a NodeJS Serverless Lambda to AWS
item.description: Serverless Lambda is amazing, so today we’re going to use a NodeJS template to create and deploy a new Serverless Lambda project to AWS.

item.title: Automated Customer Service via Conversational Artificial Intelligence (AI) - Using Amazon Web Services (AWS) Connect, Lambda, DynamoDb, S3, Node.js, ReactJS, Axios & Bootstrap 4
item.description: Coding conversational artificial intelligence? Simon Gilbert explains how to build a fully automated customer service contact centre using AWS Connect, Lambda, DynamoDb, S3, Node.js, ReactJs, Axios & Bootstrap 4
